Entry.Title: Women now allowed to apply for Royal Marines and all other frontline military roles, defence secretary announces
Entry.Description: 'For the first time in its history, our armed forces will be determined by ability alone and not gender,' Gavin Williamson says

Entry.Title: Home Office admits people were wrongly denied UK status after refusing to provide DNA evidence
Entry.Description: Sajid Javid apologises to Gurkha soldiers and Afghan nationals who were among those illegally required to provide DNA evidence to prove family ties in 'deeply troubling' Home Office admission

Entry.Title: Young girl gored by deer in London park

Entry.Title: Self-harm and violent attacks in prisons hit record high as incidents rise by 20% in a year, figures show

Entry.Title: Three men charged after pedestrians hit by car outside mosque in London

Entry.Title: American TV presenter posing with dead goats after hunt leads to 'urgent' question in Scottish parliament
Entry.Description: Larysa Switlyk branded 'sickening' and 'truly abhorrent' for sharing images on social media

Entry.Title: John McDonnell calls on Philip Hammond to admit austerity has failed in pre-Budget speech
Entry.Description: 'In her party conference speech, Theresa May announced the end of austerity. This budget will demonstrate whether or not she is true to her word'

Entry.Title: How to beat 'Black Friday' - both here and in the US
Entry.Description: This Friday is Black Friday in the States, the day after Thanksgiving, which marks the traditional start to the Christmas shopping season with massive discounts to lure shoppers. Most years it turns nasty, though. In 2011 it was marred by shootings and pepper-sprayings (one started over a tussle for a waffle iron) as bargain-hunters stampeded into stores across America.

Entry.Title: Brexit: Sadiq Khan warns Labour MPs not to let Theresa May 'blackmail' them into voting for bad deal

Entry.Title: Early deaths twice as common in most deprived parts of England, study shows
Entry.Description: 'Devastatingly stark' figures show adults in Blackpool twice as likely to die prematurely as those in affluent parts of Berkshire
